root.comment: Styles applied to the root element.

label.comment: Styles applied to the element that wraps the button children.

fontSize.comment: Default button font size can vary depending on platform.

fontWeight.comment: Medium button labels have semi bold font weight

sizeSmall.comment: Styles applied to small buttons. Border radius should not be defined here.

borderRadius.comment: Border radius for small size now uses doubleQuarter (18 logical pixels)

height.comment: Small button height is explicitly defined to avoid content vertical overflow

paddingLeft.comment: All small buttons now have left padding equivalent to 16 logical pixels

paddingRight.comment: All small buttons now have right padding equivalent to 16 logical pixels

paddingBottom.comment: All small buttons now have top padding equivalent to 6 logical pixels

paddingTop.comment: All small buttons now have top padding equivalent to 6 logical pixels

sizeMedium.comment: Styles applied to the root element if size is medium.
